Lyric:
[00:04.330]There's a fire starting in my heart
[00:08.840]Reaching a fever pitch, it's bringing me out the dark
[00:13.330]Finally I can see you crystal clear
[00:18.060]Go head and sell me out and I'll lay your shit bare
[00:22.140]
[00:22.970]See how I leave with every piece of you
[00:27.130]Don't underestimate the things that I will do
[00:31.720]There's a fire starting in my heart
[00:36.270]Reaching a fever pitch, and it's bring me out the dark
[00:40.420]
[00:41.810]The scars of your love remind me of us
[00:47.230]They keep me thinking that we almost had it all
[00:51.490]The scars of your love they leave me breathless
[00:56.320]I can't help feeling
[00:58.990]We could have had it all
[01:03.260]Rolling in the deep
[01:07.730]You had my heart inside of your hand
[01:12.800]And you played it
[01:15.250]To the beat
[01:17.640]
[01:19.240]Baby I have no story to be told
[01:23.450]But I've heard one of you, and I'm gonna make your head burn
[01:28.100]
[01:28.200]Think of me in the depths of your despair
[01:32.830]Making a home down there, reminds you of the home we shared
[01:37.080]

[02:27.500]But you played it
